title: Start
body:
Hi! 
I haven't seen you around
here before, I'm Hana,
What's your name?
-> [$name], What is this place?
    You really must not 
    be from around here, huh?
    -> What's that supposed to mean?
        All the stray cats know 
        about the Cat Cafe! 
        It's kind of a sanctuary 
        for us strays. 
        -> I'm not a stray! My owner is missing, He left this key behind, do you know what it is?
            Oh, you're so brave! 
            Hmm...No, I don't,
            but I know who would!
            You should find Akio.
            Look on the rooftops, 
            that's usually where he's at.
            -> Thanks, Hana.
    -> No, I'm not.
        Well this is the Cat Cafe!
        It's kind of a sanctuary
        for us strays.
        -> I'm not a stray! My owner is missing, He left this key behind, do you know what it is? 
            Oh, you're so brave! 
            Hmm...No, I don't,
            but I know who would!
            You should find Akio.
            Look on the rooftops, 
            that's usually where he's at. 
            -> Thanks, Hana.
See you around, [$name]!
